com.pump.awt

Class StoredPaddingInfo

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.pump.awt.PaddingInfo
      • com.pump.awt.StoredPaddingInfo

  • public class StoredPaddingInfo
extends PaddingInfo
    This maintains a list of the padding of certain components. This assumes, for example, that all JCheckBoxes using the same look-and-feel will use the same padding. Whenever a cached value is missing, this defers to the more expensive PaddingInfo.get() method and stores that value.

    • Method Detail

      • get

        public java.awt.Insets get(java.awt.Component jc)
        Description copied from class: PaddingInfo
        This returns the empty pixels that pad a component. If the insets can't be determined empty insets are returned (0,0,0,0).
        Overrides:
        get in class PaddingInfo
        Parameters:
        jc - the component to study.
        Returns:
        the empty pixels that pad a component as insets.
